content.rendered:
Directed by Mahesh Manjrekar

Written by Mahesh Manjrekar. Abhijeet Shirish Deshpande. Siddharth Salvi. Mahesh Manjrekar. Abhijeet Shirish Deshpande. Siddharth Salvi. Pravin Tarde. Mithlesh Kaushik

Star Salman Khan (Rajveer Singh). Aayush Sharma (Rahul Patil). Mahima Makwana (Manda Vichare). Mahesh Manjrekar (Satya Vichare). Rohit Haldikar (Ganya). Jisshu Sengupta (Pitya Bagare). Nikitin Dheer (Daya Bagare). Upendra Limaye (Nanya Bhau). Sayaji Shinde (SI Uday Nanaware). Bharat Ganeshpure (Advocate Soman). Sachin Khedekar (Dattaram Patil – Rahul’s Father). Chhaya Kadam (Dhurpi Patil – Rahul’s Mother). Sharad Ponkshe (MLA Sharadrao Hambir). Prem Dharmadhikari (Siddharth Maruti Kamble). Siddhi Dalvi (Seema Patil – Rahul’s Sister). Uday Tikekar (Shinde Seth). Rohit Phalke (Arun Nanaware). Nupur Dudwadkar (Babu (as Nupur Dhudwadkar)). Ganesh Revdekar (Farmer Tukya (as Ganesh Rewdekar)). Umesh Jagtap (Maruti Kamble). Dhananjay Mandrekar (Head Constable Padwal). Ruturaj Shinde (Vikas – Market Yard Clerk). Shashank Bawkar (Vijay Patwardhan). Shashank Shende (More Kaka). Vijay Nikam (Corporator Salvi). Sarth Surve (Shinde’s Son). Lankesh Bhardwaj (Market Yard Commission Agent). Sandeep Juwatkar (Pakya). Medha Ghadage (Maruti Kamble’s Wife). Kishore Nandlaskar (Maruti Kamble’s Uncle). Nitin Tambe (Police Constable). Waluscha De Sousa (Special Appearance in the song ‘Chingari’). Varun Dhawan (Special Appearance in the song ‘Vighnaharta’). Atul Kale (Dhaba Family – Father). Rucha Barve (Dhaba Family – Mother). Jaideep Mhatre (Dhaba Family – Son). Tapasya Chalke (Dhaba Family – Daughter). Kapil Joshi (Dhaba Family – Friend). Rajesh Bhosle (Farmer In Market Yard). Sanchi Parab (Market Yard Farmer’s Daughter). Jyoti Raul (Market Yard Farmer’s Wife). Shriram Pendse (Shinde’s Assistant). Bharat Patni (Mr. Agarwal). Raya Bhave (Mr. Mittal). Sachin Padalkar (Mittal’s Servant). Nayan Jadhav (Rahul’s Driver). Prathiba Bhagat (Gunya’s Mother). Alka Parab (Nanya’s Wife)

Language Hindi

Producers Sushila Charak. Himanshu Joshi. Piya Mirajkar. Shamiraah Nambiar. Anup Poddar. Krishna Rishi. Yogiraj Shetty

Production Salman Khan Films
